exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie flat on bench, grip bar slightly wider than shoulders, lower to chest, press upward until arms locked.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Set bench to 30–45°, lower bar to upper chest, press up until arms are extended.

exercises.name: Decline Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on decline bench, lower bar to lower chest, press until arms extended.

exercises.name: Flat Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells above chest, lower slowly until elbows at 90°, press back up.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Incline bench 30–45°, lower dumbbells to chest level, press upward together.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Fly
exercises.instructions: With slight elbow bend, open arms wide, stretch chest, bring dumbbells back together above chest.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Fly
exercises.instructions: Lie on incline bench, perform fly motion focusing on upper chest contraction.

exercises.name: Cable Fly
exercises.instructions: Stand center between pulleys, bring handles together in front of chest, slowly return to start.

exercises.name: Pec Deck Machine
exercises.instructions: Sit upright, bring arm pads together, squeeze chest, and return slowly.

exercises.name: Push-Up
exercises.instructions: Keep body straight, lower chest to floor, then press up until arms straight.

exercises.name: Chest Dip
exercises.instructions: Lean forward on dip bars, lower until elbows at 90°, press back up.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Perform bench press using guided bar path for stability and control.

exercises.name: Machine Chest Press
exercises.instructions: Press handles forward from chest height until arms extended, return slowly.

exercises.name: Standing Cable Crossover
exercises.instructions: Cross cable handles in front of chest, squeeze pecs, then return arms wide.

exercises.name: Pull-Up
exercises.instructions: Grip bar shoulder-width, pull body until chin clears bar, lower with control.

exercises.name: Chin-Up
exercises.instructions: Grip bar underhand, pull up until chin above bar, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.instructions: Pull bar to upper chest, squeeze back muscles, slowly return upward.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.instructions: Sit upright, pull handle to midsection, squeeze shoulder blades together.

exercises.name: Bent-Over Barbell Row
exercises.instructions: Hinge at hips, row barbell to lower chest, keep back flat throughout.

exercises.name: T-Bar Row
exercises.instructions: Hold V-handle, row bar toward torso, squeeze shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.instructions: Support one knee on bench, pull dumbbell to waist, pause, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Inverted Row
exercises.instructions: Lie under bar, pull chest to bar keeping body straight.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Lift barbell from floor to hip height, maintaining flat back and strong core.

exercises.name: Rack Pull
exercises.instructions: Perform deadlift from knee height focusing on lockout and back strength.

exercises.name: Straight-Arm Pulldown
exercises.instructions: Pull straight bar from overhead to thighs while keeping arms straight.

exercises.name: Reverse Fly
exercises.instructions: With bent-over torso, raise arms sideways focusing on rear delts.

exercises.name: Machine Row
exercises.instructions: Pull handles to torso, pause, and slowly return to start.

exercises.name: Shrug
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, shrug shoulders up, pause, then lower slowly.

exercises.name: Barbell Shrug
exercises.instructions: Grip barbell, elevate shoulders as high as possible, then lower.

exercises.name: Good Morning
exercises.instructions: Hinge forward with slight knee bend, lower torso, then return upright.

exercises.name: Overhead Barbell Press
exercises.instructions: Press barbell overhead from chest height, keep core tight, lock out arms at top.

exercises.name: Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.instructions: Sit upright, press dumbbells overhead, lower slowly to shoulder level.

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.instructions: Start palms facing in, rotate wrists outward while pressing overhead.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: With slight bend in elbows, raise arms sideways to shoulder height, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Front Raise
exercises.instructions: Lift dumbbells in front to shoulder height, pause, then lower under control.

exercises.name: Rear Delt Fly
exercises.instructions: Hinge forward slightly, lift dumbbells out to sides focusing on rear shoulders.

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: Use low pulley, raise arm outward to shoulder height keeping tension constant.

exercises.name: Upright Row
exercises.instructions: Pull bar upward along body to chest height, lead with elbows high.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Shoulder Press
exercises.instructions: Press bar upward along guided path, keep back straight.

exercises.name: Machine Shoulder Press
exercises.instructions: Press handles overhead until arms extended, return with control.

exercises.name: Face Pull
exercises.instructions: Pull rope towards face, lead with elbows high, squeeze rear delts.

exercises.name: Standing Military Press
exercises.instructions: Press barbell overhead while standing, maintain tight core.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Press
exercises.instructions: Press kettlebell overhead, stabilize with core throughout.

exercises.name: Cable Front Raise
exercises.instructions: Raise handle in front of body to shoulder height, pause, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Reverse Pec Deck Fly
exercises.instructions: Sit facing machine, move arms outward until in line with shoulders.

exercises.name: Front Plate Raise
exercises.instructions: Hold weight plate with both hands, raise to shoulder height, pause, lower.

exercises.name: One-Arm Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Press one dumbbell overhead while standing, engage core for balance.

exercises.name: Seated Lateral Raise Machine
exercises.instructions: Raise arms to shoulder height using machine pads, pause, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Bradford Press
exercises.instructions: Press bar from front rack over head to behind neck and back again, without locking out.

exercises.name: Z Press
exercises.instructions: Sit on floor with legs extended, press barbell overhead while maintaining upright torso.

exercises.name: Barbell Bicep Curl
exercises.instructions: Stand upright, curl the barbell up while keeping elbows close to your torso, then lower slowly.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl dumbbells one at a time, rotating palms up as you lift, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Hammer Curl
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells with neutral grip, curl up to shoulders, lower under control.

exercises.name: Preacher Curl
exercises.instructions: Using a preacher bench, curl the bar toward shoulders, lower slowly until arms extended.

exercises.name: Concentration Curl
exercises.instructions: Sit with elbow against inner thigh, curl dumbbell toward shoulder, squeeze at top.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
exercises.instructions: Sit on incline bench, let arms hang down, curl dumbbells upward and lower slowly.

exercises.name: Cable Curl
exercises.instructions: Using a low pulley, curl handle toward shoulders keeping elbows fixed at sides.

exercises.name: Reverse Curl
exercises.instructions: Hold barbell with overhand grip, curl toward shoulders, lower under control.

exercises.name: Zottman Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl palms up, rotate wrists at top, lower with palms facing down.

exercises.name: Chin-Up
exercises.instructions: Grip bar underhand, pull body up until chin over bar, lower under control.

exercises.name: Triceps Pushdown
exercises.instructions: Push bar or rope down until arms fully extended, keep elbows tucked at sides.

exercises.name: Overhead Dumbbell Triceps Extension
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead, lower behind head by bending elbows, extend back up.

exercises.name: Close-Grip Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Grip bar shoulder-width, lower to chest, press up focusing on triceps.

exercises.name: Skull Crusher
exercises.instructions: Lower bar to forehead by bending elbows, extend arms back to start.

exercises.name: Bench Dips
exercises.instructions: Lower body by bending elbows until arms 90°, press up to start.

exercises.name: Triceps Kickback
exercises.instructions: With upper arm parallel to floor, extend forearm back until straight.

exercises.name: Cable Overhead Triceps Extension
exercises.instructions: Face away from machine, extend arms forward from bent elbows.

exercises.name: Diamond Push-Up
exercises.instructions: Form diamond shape with hands, lower chest between hands, push up.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Reverse Curl
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells overhand, curl to shoulders, lower with control.

exercises.name: Cable Rope Hammer Curl
exercises.instructions: Use rope attachment, curl with neutral grip, keeping elbows close.

exercises.name: One-Arm Cable Curl
exercises.instructions: Perform curls one arm at a time for better isolation.

exercises.name: Spider Curl
exercises.instructions: Lie face down on incline bench, curl bar toward shoulders keeping upper arms vertical.

exercises.name: Cable Triceps Kickback
exercises.instructions: Extend cable handle back from bent elbow, squeeze triceps at end.

exercises.name: Close-Grip Push-Up
exercises.instructions: Perform push-up with hands close together under chest.

exercises.name: EZ Bar Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl bar up keeping elbows still, lower under control.

exercises.name: One-Arm Dumbbell Triceps Extension
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead with one arm, lower behind head, extend back up.

exercises.name: Cable Reverse Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl bar using overhand grip, focus on forearm engagement.

exercises.name: Wrist Curl
exercises.instructions: Rest forearms on bench, curl barbell up using wrists only.

exercises.name: Reverse Wrist Curl
exercises.instructions: Hold barbell overhand, raise hands upward by extending wrists.

exercises.name: Farmer’s Carry
exercises.instructions: Hold heavy dumbbells at sides, walk for distance keeping shoulders back and core tight.

exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
exercises.instructions: Place bar on upper back, squat down until thighs parallel to floor, drive up through heels.

exercises.name: Front Squat
exercises.instructions: Hold bar across front shoulders, keep chest up, squat down and rise with control.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.instructions: Push weight platform away with feet shoulder-width apart, don’t lock knees.

exercises.name: Walking Lunge
exercises.instructions: Step forward into lunge, push off back foot to continue walking motion.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.instructions: Rear foot elevated, lower front leg until knee at 90°, push up through heel.

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.instructions: Extend legs until straight, squeeze quads, then lower slowly.

exercises.name: Lying Leg Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl heels toward glutes, pause, lower under control.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Keep bar close to legs, hinge at hips, lower until stretch in hamstrings, stand tall.

exercises.name: Sumo Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Wide stance, grip inside knees, push through heels to lift bar upright.

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell at chest, squat down keeping torso upright.

exercises.name: Step-Up
exercises.instructions: Step onto platform with one leg, drive through heel to lift body, step down slowly.

exercises.name: Hack Squat
exercises.instructions: Position shoulders under pads, squat down and push up maintaining back contact.

exercises.name: Seated Leg Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl legs downward against resistance, return slowly.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, lift hips toward ceiling, squeeze glutes at top.

exercises.name: Hip Thrust
exercises.instructions: Place shoulders on bench, bar over hips, drive hips upward, pause, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Calf Raise (Standing)
exercises.instructions: Rise up on toes, squeeze calves, lower slowly to stretch.

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raise
exercises.instructions: Lift heels while seated, hold contraction, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Box Jump
exercises.instructions: Jump explosively onto box, land softly, step down carefully.

exercises.name: Lateral Lunge
exercises.instructions: Step to side, bend one knee, push off to return to start.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.instructions: Sit against wall with knees at 90°, hold position as long as possible.

exercises.name: Split Squat
exercises.instructions: Stagger feet, lower until back knee nearly touches floor, rise through front heel.

exercises.name: Cable Kickback
exercises.instructions: Attach ankle strap, kick leg backward, squeeze glutes at top.

exercises.name: Good Morning
exercises.instructions: With bar on back, hinge at hips keeping slight knee bend, return to standing.

exercises.name: Nordic Hamstring Curl
exercises.instructions: Anchor feet, lower body slowly forward using hamstrings, push up to start.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Balance on one leg, hinge at hips lowering weight toward floor, return upright.

exercises.name: Cable Pull-Through
exercises.instructions: Face away from cable, pull rope through legs, extend hips forward.

exercises.name: Front Foot Elevated Split Squat
exercises.instructions: Elevate front foot, lower knee toward ground, drive up through heel.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Squat
exercises.instructions: Perform squat with guided bar path for safety and stability.

exercises.name: Donkey Kick
exercises.instructions: On all fours, kick one leg upward and squeeze glutes at top.

exercises.name: Reverse Lunge
exercises.instructions: Step backward into lunge, lower until knee nearly touches floor, push forward to start.

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Leg Raise
exercises.instructions: Attach ankle strap, raise leg out to side, lower slowly with control.

exercises.name: Machine Hip Abduction
exercises.instructions: Push legs outward against pads, pause at full contraction, return slowly.

exercises.name: Machine Hip Adduction
exercises.instructions: Pull legs inward against resistance, control the return.

exercises.name: Jump Squat
exercises.instructions: Perform squat then explode upward into jump, land softly and repeat.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.instructions: Swing kettlebell from between legs to chest height using hip drive.

exercises.name: Sissy Squat
exercises.instructions: Lean back while keeping body straight, lower knees forward, return upright.

exercises.name: Cable Step-Up
exercises.instructions: Use cable resistance while stepping onto a platform, focusing on controlled ascent.

exercises.name: Barbell Lunge
exercises.instructions: Step forward under control, lower back knee near floor, push up to start.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Lunge
exercises.instructions: Perform lunge motion under controlled bar path.

exercises.name: Curtsy Lunge
exercises.instructions: Step one leg behind the other diagonally, lower body, then push up to standing.

exercises.name: Crunch
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, lift shoulders toward ceiling, squeeze abs, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Sit-Up
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, sit up fully, lower back down under control.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold body straight on forearms and toes, brace core, maintain neutral spine.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Lie on side, lift hips off ground supporting body on one forearm and foot.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.instructions: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly, twist torso side to side holding weight.

exercises.name: Leg Raise
exercises.instructions: Lie flat, lift legs together until vertical, lower slowly without touching floor.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, lift legs to hip or chest height, lower with control.

exercises.name: Knee Raise (Captain’s Chair)
exercises.instructions: Support body on forearms, lift knees to chest, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.instructions: Kneel facing cable, hold rope behind head, crunch downward contracting abs.

exercises.name: Ab Wheel Rollout
exercises.instructions: Roll wheel forward extending body, brace core, pull back to starting position.

exercises.name: Flutter Kicks
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, alternate leg kicks a few inches off the floor, keep core tight.

exercises.name: Mountain Climber
exercises.instructions: In plank, alternate driving knees toward chest quickly while maintaining posture.

exercises.name: V-Up
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, lift legs and upper body simultaneously to form a V shape.

exercises.name: Toe Touch
exercises.instructions: Lie flat, lift legs up, reach hands toward toes, squeeze abs at top.

exercises.name: Reverse Crunch
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, lift hips off floor curling pelvis toward chest.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunch
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, alternate bringing opposite elbow to knee, extend other leg.

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, extend opposite arm and leg, keep core tight, alternate sides.

exercises.name: Superman
exercises.instructions: Lie face down, lift arms and legs off floor, hold briefly, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Back Extension (Roman Chair)
exercises.instructions: Bend at waist lowering torso, raise back up keeping spine neutral.

exercises.name: Cable Woodchopper
exercises.instructions: Pull cable diagonally across body, rotate torso, control return.

exercises.name: Hanging Knee Raise
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, lift knees toward chest, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Weighted Sit-Up
exercises.instructions: Hold plate to chest, perform sit-up maintaining control.

exercises.name: Stability Ball Crunch
exercises.instructions: Lie on ball with lower back supported, crunch up, squeeze abs, lower back.

exercises.name: Plank Shoulder Tap
exercises.instructions: From plank, tap each shoulder alternating sides, keep hips stable.

exercises.name: Cable Oblique Twist
exercises.instructions: Stand side-on to cable, rotate torso away keeping arms straight, return slowly.

exercises.name: Hollow Hold
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, raise arms and legs slightly off floor, maintain tension.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.instructions: On all fours, extend opposite arm and leg, hold briefly, alternate sides.

exercises.name: Standing Cable Crunch
exercises.instructions: Stand facing cable, crunch forward while pulling weight down.

exercises.name: Weighted Decline Sit-Up
exercises.instructions: Hold weight on chest, perform sit-up on decline bench with control.

exercises.name: Side Bend (Dumbbell)
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell in one hand, bend sideways lowering weight, return upright.

exercises.name: Burpee
exercises.instructions: Drop to plank, perform push-up, jump feet forward, then jump vertically.

exercises.name: Mountain Climber Burpee
exercises.instructions: Add two mountain climbers to standard burpee for extra core engagement.

exercises.name: Thruster
exercises.instructions: Perform a front squat, then drive barbell overhead in one motion.

exercises.name: Clean and Press
exercises.instructions: Clean barbell to shoulders, then press overhead, lower to floor under control.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.instructions: Swing kettlebell from between legs to shoulder height using hip drive.

exercises.name: Man Maker
exercises.instructions: Combine push-up, row, squat clean, and press into one continuous movement.

exercises.name: Turkish Get-Up
exercises.instructions: From lying down, rise to standing holding kettlebell overhead, reverse slowly.

exercises.name: Bear Crawl
exercises.instructions: Crawl forward on hands and feet, keeping hips low and core tight.

exercises.name: Sled Push
exercises.instructions: Lean forward, drive sled forward with powerful leg strides.

exercises.name: Sled Pull
exercises.instructions: Pull sled backward using arms and legs, maintain steady motion.

exercises.name: Battle Rope Slam
exercises.instructions: Lift ropes overhead and slam forcefully to ground in alternating rhythm.

exercises.name: Medicine Ball Slam
exercises.instructions: Lift medicine ball overhead, slam it to the ground with full power.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.instructions: Jump continuously over rope rotating with wrists, keep rhythm steady.

exercises.name: Box Jump
exercises.instructions: Jump explosively onto box, land softly, step down carefully.

exercises.name: Wall Ball Shot
exercises.instructions: Perform squat holding ball, drive up and throw at wall target, catch and repeat.

exercises.name: Power Clean
exercises.instructions: Lift barbell explosively from floor to shoulders using legs and hips.

exercises.name: Snatch
exercises.instructions: Lift barbell from floor overhead in one continuous motion using hip power.

exercises.name: Dead Clean
exercises.instructions: Pull barbell from floor to shoulders explosively without additional squat.

exercises.name: Sandbag Carry
exercises.instructions: Carry sandbag in front of body while walking steadily.

exercises.name: Farmer’s Walk (Heavy)
exercises.instructions: Hold heavy weights at sides, walk forward keeping posture upright.

exercises.name: Sprint
exercises.instructions: Run at full speed for short distance focusing on drive and form.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.instructions: Run in place lifting knees to hip height quickly.

exercises.name: Jumping Jack
exercises.instructions: Jump legs out while raising arms overhead, return to start and repeat.

exercises.name: Bear Complex
exercises.instructions: Sequence of clean, front squat, press, back squat, and press from behind neck.

exercises.name: Walking Lunge with Twist
exercises.instructions: Lunge forward while twisting torso toward front leg, repeat alternating sides.

exercises.name: Clean and Jerk
exercises.instructions: Clean barbell to shoulders, dip slightly, then drive overhead in split stance.

exercises.name: Lateral Bounds
exercises.instructions: Jump laterally side to side, land softly and balance briefly before next jump.

exercises.name: Burpee Box Jump
exercises.instructions: Perform a burpee, then jump onto box explosively and step down.

exercises.name: Rowing Machine
exercises.instructions: Row with full leg drive and strong pull, maintain rhythm.

exercises.name: Assault Bike
exercises.instructions: Pedal and push handles simultaneously maintaining consistent power output.
